series.title: Perry Rhodan
series.description: Perry Rhodan is a science fiction series of more than a thousand novels, which started in the 1960's in Germany and has been translated into many languages. The editions and combinations of novels in editions are countless.

series.title: Perry Rhodan Zyklus: Die dritte Macht
series.description: This is the series about "Die dritte Macht" Heftromane (not to confuse with "Die Dritte Macht" Buch)
